## What is Quarto?

> An open-source scientific and technical publishing system.

## What does that mean?

- Open-source
    - Source code is publicly available
    - Free
- Scientific and technical
    - Equations, graphs, citations
    - Include code or code output
- Publishing
    - Document creation (pdf, HTML, Word)
    - Journal templates
    - Quarto Pub is a free publishing platform

## What can you make with it?

- Websites
- Presentations (like this one)
- Books

## Websites

- Blogs
- Software documentation
- Courses
- Portfolio
